views.markdown:
- No Video And No Homescreen Ads 
- Background Playback 
- Picture-In-Picture (iOS 14+, iPhone Only) 
- Video Downloading (Can Import Downloaded Videos To Camera Roll, iPhone Only) 
- Audio Downloading (iPhone Only) 
- Unlock UHD Quality (iOS 14+) 
- Allow HD On Cellular Data 
- Disable Video Endscreen Popups 
- Disable Video Info Cards 
- Disable Video AutoPlay 
- Disable Double Tap To Skip 
- Always Show Player Bar 
- Show Status Bar In Overlay (Portrait Only) 
- Hide Previous & Next Button In Overlay 
- Hide AutoPlay Switch In Overlay 
- Hide Captions/Subtitles Button In Overlay 
- Disable Related Videos In Overlay 
- Hide Overlay Dark Background 
- Hide Tab Bar Labels 
- Hide Tabs (Explore, Create/Upload[+], Subscriptions, Library) 
- Enable iPad Style On iPhone 
- No Download Button 
- No Comments Section 
- No Cast Button 
- No Notification Button 
- No Search Button 
- No Topics Section 
- Disable YouTube Kids 
- Disable Voice Search 
- Disable Hints 
- Hide Channel Watermark 
- Oled Dark Mode (iOS 13) 
- Colour Options (iOS 14+)
- Fixed 'Oled Dark Mode' and 'Colour Options' on the latest YouTube version (16.19.6)

Completely redesigned the Downloads Player: 
- Separated downloaded videos and downloaded audio 
- Fixed non mp4s and non m4as appearing in the Downloads List 
- Added artwork support to the Downloads List 

Other Changes: 
- Add artwork downloading to the audio downloader 
- Updated credits 

Notice for iPadOS users: 
- We have still been unable to fix Downloading and Picture-In-Picture on iPadOS, so we decided to hide the Downloading/Pip 'op' button in the video overlay until we are able to fix it, sorry.

- Added 'Unlock UHD Quality' (iOS 14+, Credits to Poomsmart) 
- Updated 'Hide Video Info Cards' for the latest YouTube version 
-Updated 'Oled Dark Mode' and 'Colour Options' for the latest YouTube version 
- Added Background Playback to Audio Downloads in the Downloads Player 
- Added a Background Playback check to Picture-In-Picture
- Added the yt consent cookie to Video / Audio Downloading (Credits to youtube-dl Team and Alexander Eichhorn)

- Fixed an error where the iPadOS warning popup could appear with 'Enable iPad Style On iPhone' option enabled on iOS 
- Added a popup to the video overlay op button on iPadOS saying that we are looking into the issue of Picture-In-Picture and Downloading not working on iPadOS

- Fixed an error with YouTubeReborn13.dylib 
- Fixed an error with YouTubeReborn14.dylib

- Fixed the Audio Downloader not converting to m4a properly (fixes the audio file still having the video codec in it, it now properly converts to audio only) 
- Added metadata to the Video Downloader

- Improved Oled Dark Mode (iOS 13) 
- Improved Colour Options (iOS 14+) 
- Added an error popup if googles api returns null
